alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 23 at 6:43PM MDT until June 23 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 643 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 15 miles east of Campo, or 23 miles northeast of Boise City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Baca County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
